long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clear Input Fields is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience by providing a quick and easy way to clear all input fields on any webpage with a single click. 

Whether you are filling out forms, entering data, or just want to reset your inputs, this extension is the perfect tool to enhance your productivity and save time.

Features:
•	One-Click Clearing: Instantly clear all input fields and text areas on the current page with a single click.
•	User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design, making it easy for anyone to use.
•	Lightweight: Minimal impact on your browser's performance, ensuring a smooth and fast browsing experience.
•	Secure: The extension does not collect any user data, ensuring your privacy and security.

How to Use:
1.	Install the Extension: Add Clear Input Fields to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2.	Activate the Extension: Click on the Clear Input Fields icon in your browser toolbar.
3.	Clear Inputs: Click the "Clear Inputs" button in the popup window to clear all input fields on the current page.

Permissions:
•	Active Tab: Required to execute the script on the currently active tab
